Description:
Detects an uncommon svchost parent process

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Uncommon Svchost Parent Process
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\svchost.exe' and  not ((parent_process_path like '%\mrt.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\ngen.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\rpcnet.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\services.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\tiworker.exe') or parent_process_path = 'null' or (parent_process_path = '-' or parent_process_path = '')))
